entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 21 March 2023
